```{loading libraries}
library(publicationsscraper)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
# Publications of each author by year
pubs <- get_publications("0000-0002-2140-5352", "vamErfkAAAAJ")

pubs %>%
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(publication_date)) %>%
  dplyr::count(publication_date) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = as.numeric(publication_date), y = n)) +  
  geom_line(color= "red") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Publications Over Time", x = "Year", y = "Number of Publications")
```
